pli-tv-pvr2.5:1.1_0: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.5:1.2_0: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.5:1.3_0: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr2.5:2.1_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.5:2.2_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ catūhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.5:2.3_0: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.5:2.4_0: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.5:2.5_0: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr2.5:2.6_0: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
